2-bWaYGxsBSoGXD7VBREVw.text: Stopped in this place for a quick bite and was pleasantly surprised! First, it seemed as if many people were regulars and it was definitely busy. Although as busy as it was it didn't seem too long to wait for our food.   Got the hummus and a chicken pita with fries! Delicious. Highly Recommend

VIPvxNVLMmCknXInTt-ECQ.text: My boyfriend frequents here so much the server knows his favorite order by heart (although he likes everything). He swears it is just as good as Greece and I think it is just as good as Chicago's greek town. All the orders come with fries (not stated on menu)  which are mediocre. The sauce is delicious and you can acquire hot sauce by request.  The pita is so big and filled with delicious meat I thought I was going to have leftovers but it was too delicious and I ate it all.  Best in Phoenix.  Got the fries today, so much better! Hot, crispy, delicous. I need to find more places like this...

EJx1XGCQ3D7lhxsrD8duHQ.text: I went on a vacation to Arizona from Chicago and was told king gyros had great food. The food wasn't great it was beyond fantastic i don't know where to start. I kept on ordering out when I was there for 2 weeks and this is the only restaurant I would ever fly out for it I became a millionaire. Great family owned business and fantastic food.

pFxI4s2cs8TPhHWMox7TJw.text: This place is amazing! I've been coming since I was 16 years old and I'm now I'm 31! 15 years of amazing food! I'm native but now live in another state. Every trip home I always stop in for the best gyros I've ever eaten. I only wish they could come home with me because I would be in heaven but probably broke!

8tIGg1k_SwECKydM9iXdFg.text: I love this place!!! The best chicken Greek salad ever!! I would definitely recommend this place to a friend... Come here for lunch when we have training!! They always give us extra feta, they are always nice and friendly and always busy but fast service!!

kw4JlNhK0xCHo9vV8tqHUg.text: My all time favorite greek place! My wife brought me here 6 yrs ago and ever since then I come back every time I'm in Phoenix. The owner Benny and his wife are like family. They always greet us with hugs and kisses, happy to have a place where all I have to say is I want the "usual" and she knows it means the beef kabob plate which btw is amazing.  The gyros are the best I've  ever had. Love this place! Highly recommend this awesome joint!

SytI_JZDs557fSoRp3yZlw.text: I love gyros and this is my favorite place to get them. I have yet to find anyplace that even comes close when it comes to quality and quantity, especially for the price. The people who work there are very friendly and chat me up like they recognize me regardless of whether or not they really do. They always get my order right and they have me in and out very quickly. I go here every chance I get, even if it means travelling across town since I live on the extreme west side.

nmQhz7nj27pdApe-b5qbNQ.text: This is one review I feel horrid writing anything negative since the lady owner was so accomodating to us (and actually cared if we liked the food), however, I eat an awful lot of my favorite ethnic food and feel pretty qualified to write on it.   OK, the hummus was really fresh which was a plus but, for me, a tad too much garlic  altho my table companions liked it (so I'll shut up).  Good pita served with it that was toasted just right, tho. The gyros itself and the pita were A+, the tzatziki had a little too much dill in it, and where was the diced cucumber I am so acclimated to in it?  But the tzatzkiki consistency was thickish which is right, because sometimes stores make it way too thin and runny. But the gyro was muy good.  Why do other gyros joints don't have fresh cooked meat like this and their gyros are always so overcooked and burnt?  Not at King Gyros.  Very fresh cooked meat = wonderful and juicy like it's supposed to be. The baklava was good, too, but no nuts made it go somewhat downhill.  I miss the nuts..sorry.  I'd pay for the nuts to be put in it myself. But the gyro meat--and the nice, fresh pita bread--tops!!!  Some of the best cooked gyro meat I've ever had...and they don't skimp on the servings either since you get a really fat portion of meat with none of this fake-you-out-by-using-fillers-like-lots-of-lettuce-on-top stuff.  Worth the trip just to get the gyro, frankly...it's superb!!!!  The BEST I've had here so far! Definitely trying this place again.  I'm torn between 4 and 5 stars, so--in the name of strictly testing (yeah, sure)--I have to come back and re-test all.  See?  Anything for fairness...gawd, but I love that excuse to eat great food.... Prices are very reasonable, by the way.

lUc_O4B4cdM9Dicnm4Vh9A.text: Love this place! They have really good gyros but I must admit my favorite plate to get here is the chicken kabob plate. My husband always gets the Combo plate. So good! This isn't exactly the closest to my house but we'll worth the drive. I can most definitely say I will be a continuing customer.

bOx21rDXDk9bMITku7oS1w.text: Got the original gryo, and must say it was quite tasty!  Onions, tomatoes, tzatziki sauce and plenty on gryo meat! I like authentic places and this seems fit the bill. Only been there once, but already know I will be back to get the original gyro again as well as try other items!

nAUxKKblOjh1SBKWlCnjxg.text: If you follow any of my reviews you will see I am attempting to try every Gyro place I pass by.  I have easily eaten at 30-40 unique shops and each has their ups and downs but few have the complete package for me. Kings is no exception.  I would say they have the best Tzatziki of any place I've eaten at locally.  They use the same Pitas as most good places do.  Yet they lost me with the generic borderline grocery store frozen fries.  The establishment is nice, they people are nice.  I would have dropped a fifth star if the fries had not bored me.

ll6_VEwNd1tK0gvai-CFuA.text: Tried for the first time. Had the gyro and souvlaki and both were fantastic. Great prices and family run...will definitely come back.

WmAq7ytUo01JkqayvfBNOw.text: Alright. So I realize this is a gyro business, and yes they are reaaaaaally delicious....however I have to give most of the credit to their burgers. Burgers? At a gyro place? YES! And let me tell you, they have the best burgers anywhere. Homemade meat they grind in house and the flavor...o.m.g. So good. The meal will run you about 9 bucks, but lets be honest... I will pay anything for a good burger. Do it..get one and tell me how amazing it is. I dare you!

BglXrc-Jh7Ooss3Z_EWSlQ.text: This is hands down the best place for gyros in town. We travel thirty minutes for lunch just to eat here. Try the number 8 gyro plate with fries.

dB1B516YZp3xLVX7FUpmcQ.text: Best Greek food in Glendale! I came here as a first timer and couldn't be more satisfied! The lady at the counter who owns the place with her husband was so friendly and talked to me the whole time I was waiting for my food. We were discussing the difference between their mom and pop shop compared to other Greek restaraunts. She explained to me that they make all their food themselves, nothing frozen or processed. She gave me a whole container of their hummus for free just to show me how much better it was than other places. They make it fresh every 2 hours or so and it is soooo yummy! Their Chicken Gyro Salad is to DIE FOR!!!!! Definitely my new place for Gyros!

lGsA3sNDUW84YTW2Iv3yog.text: The two star is not for the food but the fact that they increased the price for the food. I remember that when I started going there, the meal I always got was a dollar less. Overnight I see that the price has gone up a dollar. I hate sneaky practices where they make small price changes to make a little extra dollar. As far as the food goes, I think the gyros are pretty decent. As far as the Pita's go, I do not think they are handmade so it tastes like anywhere else.  The people are very friendly and welcoming.

_Wets9YuDOxm02HMuFVyBQ.text: Great food, friendly family run business.  Benny makes the best tzatziki sauce in town.  I always get the souvlaki plate with their delicious rice and his wife remembers extra pita, extra sauce. My wife loves their gyros. Their chicken pita is great too. Everything is great.  Go there now.

JHoEv8Us85bm9nSPy5wsoQ.text: Was a great place to eat, now food is greasy, and it doesn't taste like it used to. Used to have a more of a homemade taste, now tastes like Costco business center. Sad. I loved going here.

6AqH1-EACEXllarxvxQf4w.text: This place has answered my prayers.  Just when I thought I couldn't find a really good, inexpensive middle eastern place, my friend brought me here.  1.  Really good, really fresh pita bread 2.  Awesome salad, very fresh and tasty. 3.  Great tzatziki, and I'm very picky 4.  Loved the gyros and chicken equally  Plus the people working there are super nice and friendly! I will be back often!

YtIq5zt47tawnDN114y4Pg.text: I had a very good chicken salad from there today, I smothered the chicken in their AMAZING hummus, and dipped the veggies in the dill dressing and it hit the spot for lunch! The pitas as very good too. The salad coulda used a little more olives and feta...

cYbZc4la6uc2m4vWpmY_sA.text: I have been coming to this place frequently for about 5+ years now. The Pork Slouvaki plate or the Pork Pita never disappoints me. My best friend loves their hamburger (big!). I will say the fries portion is not usually a large quantity, but the main course more than enough fills me up. I keep saying I'm going to try the chicken kebab plate or one of their Italian dishes, but I still go back to my usual (slouvaki plate). I love dipping my pita in extra tzatziki sauce. Oh and bonus? The slouvaki plate comes with a side greek salad! Score!

dfp-RNqfpN9Vk03KEU0skA.text: I have been coming here for years and it has always been and always will be the best Gyros you will ever find. I've tried other place's gyros and nothing will ever beat the King Gyros.  I love the atmosphere in this,while small, very charming place. I usually get my food to go but I wouldn't mind hanging out at King Gyros while I enjoy the masterfully crafted Gyros.

mE9-bAYzpSEOwPnTN-Keag.text: First time here and was very impressed with the Gyro salad...will definitely come back and try other food selections...

l44hVbqiPNPYt-aio2hXhA.text: The owners of this place are awesome and the food is just as good. Our favorites are the gyros and the chicken kabob plate. The kabobs are served over a bed of yellow rice with sauted/stewed veggies that are amazing. The chicken is incredibly good as well. It come with a salad that is probably the freshest salad you well ever get at a fast food place. Their pastas are very tasty as well. Highly recommend king gyros, I guarantee you will be pleased.

ea_xTm74GQ05_oY71RpALg.text: This family-owned restaurant is so awesome. The service is very personal, and the food makes me crave and come back for more! I almost always get the Gyro salad. It's FABULOUS! They never get my order wrong and they even memorize it. They are on point.   King Gyros is just, perfect.

lgtiu6lYfIgH0bQPdLvrLw.text: Super great food especially the rice and grilled chicken. So much flavor and tastes very authentic. I love this place and highly recommend if you are in the area. The place is small and tucked in a strip mall but don't let that detour you it is worth trying and enjoying some great eats. Staff is friendly and remembers me everything I go there.

6GkzG0AzKGh7WtcAKTPznQ.text: Best Gyro place hands down! The gyro meat is perfect. And you get a lot. All veggies are fresh too. The prices are very fair.  I usually go with my brother for lunch and we always order the gyro salad. Well the owner lady now remembers us and just asks "the usual?", we laugh and say "yes please".  Also don't forget to wave at the guys in the kitchen. They seem always in a great mood! Always smiling, or maybe they just think I'm cute? lol. Either way you can't go wrong with King Gyro, great food and great people!

zllcvmbFTZaB8XhAApYUbg.text: Circled the park lot of this Strip Mall before finding the restaurant.  Pet peeve-why are address so unclearly marked?  Anyway, King Gyros is the bomb!  The smells drifting from the restaurant were tantalizing.  I ordered the chicken pita and hubby got a chicken sandwich.  Not much difference except mine was in pita bread and he was in a roll.  The Tzatziki sauce had a nice flavor of dill and yogurt.  Both plates came with a serving of fries.  The chicken was flavorful and succulent.  Patrons kept coming in at an early happy r to either dine in or take out.  The food is fresh and owners are Greek and nice.  Prices are definitely affordable in this casual place. Worth the trip if you're in the area.

HB56dGzYY49nmvOUnQls8Q.text: We never go anywhere but here!! The best place , nice staff...the restaurant is small and in the summer a little hot so get it to go...

DSTspWts_ourAL7C7gJVlw.text: OMG its good ! Lets be completely honest, I am as easy to please as I am to rub the wrong way and in the over a dozen times I have been here the food has just been excellent. The people are friendly, and super nice, the service is wonderful.   Love it  !

TH6_nqu3OU-ZqfEDwT0Q3w.text: This place rocks I'm visiting from Chicago and have been spoiled with delicious food came to King Gyro turns out the owner is originally from Chicago and I was very impressed with the food and customer service best gyro in town awesome sauce!!!

iwRa48o1gXJpe_L-e4UDPA.text: I have tried many gyro placed but this one is the best!! If you like a variety get the combo plater. But I still love the Gyro and Greek salad. The gyro is overfilled with the best meat. You'll love it!!

Vo7owX-vN8hqSBrh5An13Q.text: I was one of their 1st customers. Have been going there forever. Staff has never changed. Super clean as always. All food made to order. Great all around gyros fast food restaurant. American Greek food with French fries. Not like authentic Greek food. But stupid good and addictive. Love this place

pfWYAYBYbCAhzzVhK8xJqQ.text: The prices, selection, service and food are great. If you're into American-Greek food, this is one of the better ones.

SuMCj4w-oKhbzKZUa8WwDg.text: Decided to try this out after reading about it on Yelp!  Why we haven't been here sooner is beyond me - we live less than a mile from it!!!  My husband and myself had the gyro platter - very good and the place was hopping - not sure if it was because it was a Friday or as we have now learned it's that good.  And there are truly Greek people working there - now that is authentic!  Nothing fancy - you're eating on paper plates with plastic ware - easy clean up!  Definitely going back and trying something different....

aiZk3SVog_3gZMzT-Ashfw.text: This place is amazing. The food is delicious. I have to at least come to this place 3 times a week. I really recommend for everyone to please stop by this place and try their chicken pita especially. Wonderful service as well

2q4OmcX8ycscaOALW6aHbA.text: Absolutely the best gyro I've had in Phoenix. The portion size of meat was almost amazing and it was fresh and well seasoned, served with thick cut fries. My accomplice had the chicken pita, moist, flavorful well seasoned chicken and again lots of it. Their menu had lots more interesting things on it and all of the food I saw come out looked really good. It would be hard not to like this place.

7bqjXwFIfl-2EWtYm2XcUA.text: If you like your gyros full of meat and not lost under a salad, then this place is for you!  This is the real deal, the gyro meat is tender and full of spices, and cut fresh from the spit to order.  Not the reheated or grilled meatloaf some places try to pass off as gyro meat.  The pitas are warm and are more than able to keep the abundance of ingredients in check.  The tzatziki sauce is a bit runny but with lots of dill...Restaurant is always clean and staff is friendly.  I have been coming here for years, and will continue to do so.

__HOTEbeQUJmtTAp5D8mMA.text: Delicious! Great gyros and super nice owners. We always stop by when in the area. I highly recommend King Gyro!

E32V_JMmp13toFkyDrEdsw.text: This is my favorite Mediterranean restaurant in Phoenix. Growing up in Chicago, it was hard for me to find a Greek spot that I really enjoyed, but have found exactly what I was looking for at King Gyros. The owners are always so kind, and welcoming, and there is always just a great atmosphere every time I stop by. Most people can not taste the difference with Gyros, but I have to say they have the best Gyro meat. Their tzatziki sauce is probably one of my favorite things about the place. It just makes everything better! Their Chicken Pita sandwich is also always amazing. Their spices and ingredients are what makes their restaurant stand out. I will continue to come to king gyros while I live in Phoenix at least once a week. Go and try it out for yourselves, I promise you will not be disappointed!

ODQN4uStGSdLLQZHYJ29hQ.text: Looking for great gyros in a family run joint.  You found it.  Great Gyros, nice fresh warm pita, a more dilly taziki (sp?) sause.  I had the Gyros platter, that included a greek salad.  it was wonderful    Fries are nothing to write home about.  Baklava was ok.  I am a fan and I will be back.

8exJzKn-jFmLyxvW-Ub7GA.text: I've been going to this place since 1997 when the original owners were there, the two brothers or at  least I think they were brothers but anyway this was back when pure fitness was in the same parking lot for those of you can remember that far back. I used to tear up a good work out then go get myself a gyros with extra tomatoes or a steak Pita. Now a days I only stop by when I'm on that side of town and I get the chicken kebab salad and I add a little extra gryo meat on top. Love this place and I love the owners.

1gwXXapq5be7ZeaDmVDsrg.text: The gyro plate is the best in the valley. Flavorful and filling, I always get an extra pita. I order the plate., no fries extra salad. Yum. Staff always friendly. Location small but clean. Tables outside to enjoy great weather. Family pride shines through. Love their food and their passion.

f-aFsKAHUJSPRyKKtB3aUw.text: LOVE this place! My salad was huge and the gyro meat on it was cooked to perfection! My husband said his gyro sandwich was the best he has had In Phoenix, and liked how much meat came on his sandwich.You can tell this mom n pop place cooks from the heart! The sauce is delicious and the olive oil tastes like no other OO I've ever had. The restaurant is very clean, and VERY nice staff! This now is our new favorite place to eat! TRY IT...you won't be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of King Gyros - Phoenix, AZ, United States

y855KrAu0Bms3Bai_HpQ4w.text: Just found our new Go To place. Super yummy! Plenty of food on plate. Friendly service. Clean. Nice and cool. Baklava was delish!!! 5 of us went, each ordered something  different, chicken, pork, sauceage,ravioli and qyros. Salad was fresh and super good.

THBs_3bXkoxPEBrBkkW74Q.text: Stopped in for the first time today and so pleased that I did! Enjoyed one of the best Gyro sandwiches I have had!  Everything tastes very fresh and the sauce is amazing! Would highly recommend it!

mtmX7ZXOAYXHePb867A21A.text: This is one of the very few best Mediterranean food in Arizona. Tasty and fresh ingredients, and kind owners. This is a must go to place. Love their salads, gyros, kabobs and fries.

ujgMUD0K6txkbjmq9Od1Qw.text: Okay....  I love a good Gyro and anything Greek and this spot hit the mark.  The Greek salad was awesome and the Gyro was served traditional!  I will be back on my next visit to AZ!!!

c8Mx05D0rPKP8utWPEIfzQ.text: Not a big gyro fan so when this was recommended to me, I was a bit weary. I still haven't tried the gyros but it's no matter, what they call Greek spaghetti was better than what you may get at an Italian restaurant!  It tastes fresh with Roma tomatoes and the sauce is very lightly applied, but it's a good thing: trust me. The portion is huge! Then the garlic bread is the perfect amount to really sop up what's left over.  End the meal with some baklava and mm, perfect meal!   Plus it seems to be family owned. I don't eat there often but I'm still recognized every time I come in. Service is excellent, everyone is very nice - even when they are very busy and the restaurant is filled up!

7UXY3W4wVEb2hQWC1WKARg.text: Came here with my fiancee for lunch and it was mind blowing, amazingly good food. Service was fast and friendly even though it was a busy lunch time. The owner was so sweet and remembered my fiancee from previous visits and took the time to chat. We definetly will stop back in anytime we are in the area. Highly recommend you check this gem out.

ohwAZUVCSgzPkLaMhz6jCw.text: I love King Gyros!!!  It's sooo delicious. Their chicken is perfectly flavored and the rice is amazing:). The staff is super friendly and I love supporting small /local restaurants.  Do yourself a favor and check it out!!

2Dw2Qjbd718SQ5uO2g5rpQ.text: By far BEST gyros in AZ!!!! There may be one better out there, but I've had them from Flagstaff to Tucson. From Quartzite to Globe and I have yet to find one that can match the flavor, freshness and awesomeness of King Gyro. They pack their gyros with meat.....not tomatoes, lettuce (seriously people? Lettuce!?) Or other fillers. Their tzatziki is very good....not too heavy and not too light. The service is always friendly and the place is clean and tidy. This place is definitely worth your time and money.

wwH0mK8CdB4GebMILQW8FA.text: I have loved king gyros since I was a kid! These are the best gyros in arizona! It's family owned and they a r E amazing people. I guarantee the gyro platter (2 gyros, fries, and salad) it's 10 dollars but totally worth it!

58D60uCUY_nAHOMo3UZAqA.text: I'm a big fan.... Huge portions,,, great, family owned nice people, great humus, falafel, gyros, good prices...Its all good!!! did I mention GIANT Gyros :)

pYIlY1o5nP3S0T6GRuGYtg.text: I forgot to write an updated review from my last visit several months ago. I used to love this place but like the other review stated, the quality has really gone down and so had the service. I'm not impressed anymore.There is absolutely not a single reason why this restaurant excels it's competition. Decrease in quality, decrease in customer service, no thanks.

TpBxmYRQyvg35NWlO_1g9w.text: Use to go here 5 years ago when we used to live close by. Yesterday we drove there ,to see if they still as good as I remembered. It was still very good food. The owner ( I believe) is always friendly and the chicken pita is very moist & taste great. I also like that the gyro meat isn't so dry as in most places, to where you need a bunch of extra sauce to get it down!

EgpbC_nDvxIGkNwUC5FD8g.text: If you want to wait 25 mins for a chicken pita while the owners stare at you while eating their own food this is you spot. I will never come here again and tell everyone of the bad service.

_b9GrOtWobCX-QFn_yhg-g.text: This is our go to place for gyros! We've tried about quite a few in the area and this is the best.  Gyros come with a ton of meat, I always ask for an extra side of tazitki sauce bc it's delicious.

nACpvCjBvfvRCxwrKNXaxg.text: Excellent food! Our family loved it and is the best in Arizona in our opinion. Five star all the way with no hesitation!!

photos.caption: Photo of King Gyros - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Amazing Greek food! Best we&#39;ve ever experienced in Phoenix area. Will be back many many more times :-). The family is wonderful!

1SQA9z4XicfDblWaZMtcLg.text: Best Gyros restaurant in town. Place is very clean along with friendly staff. Been coming here for years,can't go wrong with anything on the menu.

IFRI8F3pLmbwIeHvpkrzIg.text: The ambiance is alright. It's a strip mall gyro shop. Nothing special about it. The staff exists, takes your order, and will even bring it to you, but they fail to make that little bit of connection.   That's not really True though, it's more that they don't try.  They take your order, they make your food, and bring it to you though, they're not rude or mean or anything of that sort. Just bored, and for some reason I found their indifference extremely off putting.  The food is good. Middle of the road. Just a gyro pita should be. The meat tastes good. It's sliced well. There's not a lot of it, so value suffers, but that's alright. The pita is somewhat dry, but again, not bad. It tastes fine, just not as soft and fluffy as I hoped. The fries are good and they serve a lot of them.  If I'm nearby, I'll go here. But I won't go out of my way, and it's definitely not a must have. DON'T AVOID THIS PLACE, it's perfectly fine. but that's all it is
